listContent.textHtml: Deck building scroll frame right of collection (button to open on the right too). Two columns. Right click on cards removes one copy, left click on collection cards or deck cards adds one copy (whenever the deck frame is open)
listContent.text: Deck building scroll frame right of collection (button to open on the right too). Two columns. Right click on cards removes one copy, left click on collection cards or deck cards adds one copy (whenever the deck frame is open)

listContent.textHtml: Controls. Keyboard panel to choose which buttons to use for cards.
listContent.text: Controls. Keyboard panel to choose which buttons to use for cards.

listContent.textHtml: Animations when adding or removing cards to deck
listContent.text: Animations when adding or removing cards to deck

listContent.textHtml: Collection should display all cards. Disabled cards should be greyed out.
listContent.text: Collection should display all cards. Disabled cards should be greyed out.

listContent.textHtml: 9 class buttons on the left as tabs.
listContent.text: 9 class buttons on the left as tabs.

listContent.textHtml: Secrets small button on the right, on top of deck
listContent.text: Secrets small button on the right, on top of deck

listContent.textHtml: Secrets tab opens the frame for the selected card. Here, you can choose between (for unobtained copies) paying for a hint, getting full info or buying the card, or (for obtained cards), destroy a copy.
listContent.text: Secrets tab opens the frame for the selected card. Here, you can choose between (for unobtained copies) paying for a hint, getting full info or buying the card, or (for obtained cards), destroy a copy.

listContent.textHtml: In the secrets tab, card in topcenter, list of copies as rows below it. each copy has buttons for hint, info, buy (or destroy, when already possessed).
listContent.text: In the secrets tab, card in topcenter, list of copies as rows below it. each copy has buttons for hint, info, buy (or destroy, when already possessed).
